title: Smart Data Models - ExcDC1A
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE DC1A direct current commutator exciter with speed input and without underexcitation limiters (UEL) inputs.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcDC1A

edfmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage exciter output limiter (Efdmax).  Typical Value = 99. Default: 0.0

efd1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (Efd1).  Typical Value = 3.1. Default: 0.0

efd2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (Efd2).  Typical Value = 2.3. Default: 0.0

efdmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage exciter output limiter (Efdmin).  Typical Value = -99. Default: 0.0

exclim.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. (exclim). IEEE standard is ambiguous about lower limit on exciter output.  true = a lower limit of zero is applied to integrator output false = a lower limit of zero is not applied to integrator output. Typical Value = true. Default: False

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 46. Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter constant related to self-excited field (Ke).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer gain (Kf).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

ks.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient to allow different usage of the model-speed coefficient (Ks).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

seefd1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Efd1 (Se[Eefd1]).  Typical Value = 0.33. Default: 0.0

seefd2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Efd1 (Se[Eefd1]).  Typical Value = 0.33. Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.06. Default: 0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (Te).  Typical Value = 0.46. Default: 0

tf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (Tf).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -0.9. Default: 0.0
